companionAccepted_Spouse: Sure! I could use some walk to stretch these legs.#$b#I am sure it'll be a lot of fun, especially with you around, @!$1
companionRejected: Sorry, I can't right now. I've gotta practice.
companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Sorry, @, but I can't stay up too late. Good night sleep is important if you wanna stay fit.#$b#Maybe tomorrow. We can jog around if you want!$1
companionDismiss: No problem, I'll see you around.
companionDismiss_Spouse: We should do this more often! It was a lot of fun!$1#$b#...and quite a workout too. Don't forget to stay hydrated, take care!
companionDismissAuto: I gotta go now, it's late and my dog needs feeding. See ya around, @!
companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Sorry if this is a bit sudden, but I think I am gonna go home now.#$b#Stay safe and go to bed soon! Love you!
companionRecruited_Spouse: This is great, I am all pumped up!$1#$b#Or maybe I am just nervous. My heart's beating so quickly!$4
companionSuggest: I feel like doing some outdoor activities today.#$q -1 -1#Do you want to come, @?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah, why not? Let me gather my things.#$r -1 0 No#Sorry, I have some things to do today. Maybe next time?
companionSuggest_No: Oh, no problem. See you later, then.
companion_Beach_Dating: You look great from all that farm work, @, your body is pretty amazing.#$b#I've always thought that, but now that we're dating, it's not weird for me to say it, right?$4
companion_Beach_Spouse: I'd like to come here with you more often, especially when it's warm out.#$b#It's pretty cool we have this beach near town, and most of the time it's like we have it all to ourselves!$1
companion_Beach_Spouse~1: You wanna go swimming with me sometime? When the weather's nice, I really get the urge!
companion_Farm: This place has a lot of space for exercising. I like it!
companion_Farm_Dating: So, this is where the magic happens, huh.#$b#I think I'd make a pretty good farmer, if this going pro thing doesn't work out.
companion_Farm_Spouse: It's so cool to see how our farm is thriving! We make a great team, don't you think?$1
companion_Forest: It's hard to move fast with all these trees and bushes, but that just makes it more challenging!
companion_Forest_Dating: It's good for us to come out here and exercise together.#$b#Not that you need it, of course!$4
companion_Forest_Spouse: Even with all these bushes and trees, I could probably figure out a cool way to work out.#$b#Like an obstacle course!
companion_Mine: This place is meant for strong people. That's why you brought me here, right?$1
companion_Mine_Dating: Hey, @, if you get scared, you can totally hold my hand.#$b#I mean, I'm fine, but it's cool if you need me, or whatever...$4
companion_Mine_Spouse: I'm glad you brought me here with you honey. I'll protect you, don't worry!
companion_Mountain_Dating: Doesn’t that science chick live out this way?#$b#Do you think her and Harvey were ever a thing? Probably, they’re both nerds.#$b#I didn’t mean that in a bad way, just, you know, they're super smart!$1
companion_Mountain_Spouse: Hey, @, we should start jogging here in the mornings, and then we could go to the spa to relax!$1
companion_Town: The town? I thought we were gonna explore someplace interesting...
companion_Town_Dating: Hey, let's go say hi to Dusty while we're here.
companion_Town_Spouse: I've been reading this new book on exercise techniques and with years of training behind me, I was thinking maybe I could start a small business in town.#$b#Like personal training, help the other residents get into better shape.#$b#What do you think?
companion_Town_Spouse~1: I need to check in with my grandparents more often.#$b#We should have them over for dinner sometime.
